name: control_flow
description: Control flow instruction test vectors (JMP, JMPIF, CALL, RET, TRY)

vectors.name: JMP_forward
vectors.description: Jump with current offset semantics, resulting stack is 2,1

vectors.name: JMPIF_true
vectors.description: Jump-if-true with current offset semantics, resulting stack is 2,3

vectors.name: JMPIF_false
vectors.description: Jump if false (0), execute PUSH2, result is 3,2

vectors.name: JMPIFNOT_true
vectors.description: Jump if not true (1), execute PUSH2

vectors.name: JMPIFNOT_false
vectors.description: Jump-if-not-false with current offset semantics, resulting stack is 2,3

vectors.name: RET_basic
vectors.description: Return from script with value on stack
